channel.title: How do u set how much exp u receive
channel.description: How do u set how much xp u receive in a skill?

item.title: How do u set how much exp u receive
item.dc:creator: @pbrain30 pbrain30
item.description:
@pbrain30 wrote:

go to your characters folder its called “characters” and look for your players name and go to the bottom or search [SKILLS] and change all the exp to wateva you want then go back outa that folder afta saving wat changes u made and use compile.bat and then logg into server
[br][size=1]Posted at: October 30, 2006, 02:13:23 AM[/size][hr]wait thats to make u certain lvl wait[br][size=1]Posted at: October 30, 2006, 02:13:58 AM[/size][hr]go to client.java and im not sure wat to search it will show all your exp values that u get and wat item you get right all u goto do is change them to wat u want[br][size=1]Posted at: October 30, 2006, 02:17:20 AM[/size][hr]then compile

Read full topic

item.title: How do u set how much exp u receive
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

kk

@echo off
COLOR 08
title "YOURSERVERHERE Client
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06injava.exe” server
pause[br][size=1]Posted at: October 30, 2006, 01:51:42 AM[/size][hr]so how u do it?
